name: The Corrupted Forest
description:
Welcome... to the CORRUPTED FOREST!

Help the fairies defend the Grand Faerie Manantial from the darkness that looms over the woods. Manage your mana and survive 10 waves!

Made by https://morsoth.itch.io/ & https://dorovich.itch.io/  for a school project.

♫ 

Tips:

  • Collect mana by clicking on the 💧! or by putting small fairies on water tiles.
  • Remember! Green beats Purple, Blue beats Red.
  • Remove fairies with 💥.
